data.title: Silent Drive reviews, music, news
data.meta_description: Album reviews, biography and music news for Silent Drive at sputnikmusic
data.text:
Silent Drive

A post-hardcore band out of Worcester, Massachusetts, Silent Drive is a four piece that create a fast and furious mix of post-hardcore and alternative music. The vocals are a stand out, ranging from melodic harmonies to strained shouts. Their debut LP, Love is Worth It was released in 2004, and the band with a slot on the Equal Vision roster are set to release a follow up sometime in 2009. The current line up is as follows: Zach Jordan - vocals Nick Van Someren - Guitar Pete Chilton - Bass Dave Joyal - Drums
